title: Beautifully Renovated Apartments In Desired Longmont Location!
posting_body: Thank you for your interest in The Legacy Apartments!
The Legacy is centrally located to everything you may need!
We have King Soopers, Super Target, Kohls, and a variety of restaurants all within walking distance, plus the Village at the Peaks Mall right up the road!
We’ve also got a spectacular view of the Rocky Mountains!
We have 17 great floor plans to meet a variety of needs.
Our wonderful community amenities and upgrades make this an amazing place to call home!
Here at The Legacy, you can warm up by the gas fireplace in your apartment or in the heated pool and hot tubs!
We are filling up quick, and we would love to give you a tour of our amazing community!
• Easy commute to Boulder, Loveland, or I-25
• Two outdoor pools, one open year round
• Two spas, both open year round
• 24-hour fitness center (the largest of any community in Longmont!)
Call and set up an appointment today!
*Prices and Specials subject to change without notice.
